text: I figured it out this weekend that you wanted to support multiple languages. An IDE can autocomplete the methods. I tried the library and I discovered many things that raised questions, I opened an issue, <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-api-php/issues/11>.

The apps in the marketplace all have the oauth flow you linked set up, which is why they work already.

You need to follow the steps of that oauth flow. During one of the steps, you will be asked to choose which HubSpot account to connect to

Thanks for opening up that issue! I really appreciate that you took the time to lay out your thoughts like that. This has sparked a couple of internal discussions about how we can improve these libraries. Iâ€™ll keep you updated as we make decisions and consider tradeoffs

We are trying to replicate the Slack integration for Google Chat. Are the needed webhooks for these notifications on the horizon? <https://drive.google.com/file/d/1AsaA-Zb0f7Jf5GJ4lhioH5sEFIkhDKJN>

Note: We are VERY interested in allowing our users to get notified in Google Chat whenever they are @ mentioned in HubSpot.
No problem, I like using the new api. It shows a lot of progress. It would be great to have a library to match that progress.
